Articles.Content:
The task is to add modules to the Kerbal XX space station in low orbit around Kerbin. Note that certain modules will already be added, such as the crew module and cupola. But other than that, start building!

 

(Lucida Sans Unicode for LIFE)

My module: Life support module (You obviously need that to survive!)
Casino module. To fund it.
movie theater module for recreation

Inflatable expandable wallet module.
Because what if casino and theater bring too much money.
Communications module, obviously for communication with the Kerbal Space Center.
Construction module to make more modules
Financial module, to not make more modules.

module module module

a module that builds modules that build modules

Thinking a little more, I would suggest make the casino module as a rotating ring. 
It spins, producing an artifial gravity. Then it stops on a random sector.

Edited January 8, 2019 by kerbiloid
A second ring rotating the opposite direction and starting and stopping with the first. If it’s going to stop a lot, might as well make it easier to keep the station from spinning

Update. A scurry of squirrels is running along the second wheel, rotating it.
It's a powerplant. It spends biofuel - nuts.

P.S.
Btw, this means that you can't bribe the croupier. The roulette stops when the squirrels get out of nuts.
(Oops, or vice versa, when they get a load.)

Edited January 11, 2019 by kerbiloid
an elevator-that-goes-to-nowhere module
Probability altering module...to evade unwanted odds.
Bio lab. To process the nuts.

A lighthouse.
To show to other satellites that here is a space station, and they should avoid collision.
Magnetic field module, to repel objects that went to close.
Large blades attached to the centrifuges, to fillet asteroids that decide they want to damage the space station.
A server room, with communication so I We can get the internet and keep a stable connection to Kerbin.
Interdimensional module to warp absolutely anywhere in no time.
An alarm clock for the no-time interdimensional module.
Large metal rods for spearing the Kraken.

Planet Killer Module.

To kill asteroids and Impactor planets.

Volumetric Printer module.

3d-prints football-sized mini-planets to launch them as projectiles from the previous one.
danny2462 module to kaboom
Add a mass relay to it.
